fr.liglab.adele.icasa.device.manager

Interface AvailableDevice

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Attributable, Device, Identifiable

    public interface AvailableDevice
extends Device
    It represents an available device. Either, a proxy is available or this device has been detected and a discovery record has been stored in shared directory (such as a ROSE repository).
    Author:
    Thomas Leveque

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface fr.liglab.adele.icasa.device.manager.Device

        LIFECYCLE_METADATA

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Application getApplicationOwner()
      Returns the service which has exported this device if it exists.
      List<DeviceProxy> getDeviceProxies()
      Returns the device proxies which exist.

      Returns the device proxy which implements all specified interfaces.
      List<DiscoveryRecord> getDiscoveryRecords()
      Returns the discovery record.
      KnownDevice getKnownDevice()
      Returns corresponding known device.
      List<ApplicationDevice> getVisibleDevices()
      Returns all devices representing this device which are visible from digital services.
